competitions.title: KYOCERA Programming Contest 2022 (AtCoder Beginner Contest 271)
competitions.description: This AtCoder competition is a 100 minute event involving solving problems of increasing difficulties. This competition is targeted at beginners, so the problems will be easier overall.

competitions.title: Codeforces Round #823 (Div. 2)
competitions.description: This Codeforces competition is a 2:00 hour event that consists of numerous programming problems. This is a great competition for all levels, because the problems increase in difficulty over time which allows you to gage your current skill level.

competitions.title: AtCoder Regular Contest 149
competitions.description: This competition is a 2 hour event hosted on AtCoder.
